recipe.recipe_name: Oatmeal With Fresh Berries and Almonds
recipe.ingredients: - oats: 1 cup - water: 2 cups - fresh strawberries (sliced): 1/2 cup - fresh blueberries: 1/2 cup - almonds (slivered): 1/4 cup - ground cinnamon: 1/2 teaspoon - vanilla extract: 1 teaspoon - optional sweetener (stevia or monk fruit): to taste
recipe.directions: 1. Cook Oatmeal: In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add 1 cup of oats and reduce the heat to medium-low, simmering for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally until the oats are soft and have absorbed most of the water. 2. Add Flavor: Stir in the vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, and optional sweetener into the cooked oatmeal. 3. Add Toppings: Remove the oatmeal from heat and let it sit for a minute. Serve the oatmeal in bowls, topping each with sliced strawberries, blueberries, and slivered almonds. 4. Serve Warm: Enjoy your flavorful and nutritious oatmeal warm.
